description: User Service requires the PostgreSQL database to be provisioned before it can be fully implemented and tested.
mitigation_plan: Use a local Docker-based PostgreSQL for initial unit testing.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all backend development that requires data persistence.

description: The JWT Strategy must be implemented after the logout/blocklisting logic so it knows to check the Redis blocklist.
mitigation_plan: Define service interfaces early to allow for parallel development with mocks.
impact_if_delayed: Delays implementation of protected API endpoints.

description: Security scanning jobs are integrated into the existing CI workflow.
impact_if_delayed: Delays implementation of automated security gates.
